238.sentence: All in all I am pleased with the router.

239.sentence: The power, low noise operation, and speed control makes up for the problems I have experienced.

240.sentence: The power, low noise operation, and speed control makes up for the problems I have experienced.

241.sentence: The power, low noise operation, and speed control makes up for the problems I have experienced.

242.sentence: It it is a bit heavy for hand held work, but any router this size will be.

243.sentence: Recenly the variable speed control went out.

244.sentence: It would work fine for a while then as the motor warmed up it would die.

245.sentence: The only other problem with this router that I have encountered is the plunge action will start to stick, then it needs to be cleaned and lubricated.

246.sentence: Overall it is a great value.

247.sentence: For the price I don't think you can beat it.

248.sentence: This is a fantastic tool to use.

249.sentence: Only problem is that is a bit heavy.

250.sentence: This is a quality product, not to be confused with teh cheap junk that Hitachi gets manufactured in China.

251.sentence: They last about 1 1/2 years until the problems start.

252.sentence: My first router is a safety hazard if you do not pay attention and are not very careful.

253.sentence: When the router is working it is a very nice machine for the money.

254.sentence: When the router is working it is a very nice machine for the money.

256.sentence: Once a depth is locked, it will jump off a little while working.

258.sentence: But, for the money it is a good machine.

259.sentence: But, for the money it is a good machine.

260.sentence: Well, my second one is now beginning to hicup a bit after about 1 1/2 years.

261.sentence: The electronic speed control is not doing it's job and the router begins to speed up and slow down at will.

262.sentence: For the hobbiest, it's probably a nice buy.

263.sentence: For the person that uses the equipment every day, pay the extra and get a reliable & safer unit.

264.sentence: If this machine just stops on you, unplug it quickly and get out of the way!
